alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:41PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Madison and central Beaverhead Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 241 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dillon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dillon, Beaverhead Rock State Park and Glen. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 51 and 80 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
